_header: Mine worldly joy upon me rue
_description: ‘Pur ma soueraigne’ — thirty lines with interlocking rimes

BLSl1212.First Lines:
Myn wordly Ioy vp on me reweAnd mercyles lete me noȝt
                    pace…
BLSl1212.Last Lines:
…Wheche may noþer fade nor staynefforgete me noȝt to
                    ȝour mercy I me complayne
BLSl1212.Attributed Author:
lucas(?) (f. 1v, signed ‘lucas’ to right of last
                    line, may be both author and scribe)
BLSl1212.Attributed Title:
pur ma soueraigne (f. 1v, in top margin by
                    scribe)
BLSl1212.Editions:
Fehr,  Bernhard. 
             “Weitere Beiträge zur englischen Lyric des 15 und 16
                Jahrhunderts.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         107 (1901): 48-61: 51.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 142-3.
